name: Phone System Web Interface
short_description:
At Winthrop University's Telecommunications Department, we have been coding a web interface to change values in the database that affect the Asterisk phone system in realtime.  We coded this under the GNU GPL and are sharing our results with the community that made this project possible.  Special thanks to the developers of Asterisk, Apache, PHP, Postgres, and Gentoo, the OS that ties our project together. 

Also, special thanks to the PHPseclib project, which enabled remote commands from the web interface.
summary: PHP front end, Postgres backend, Asterisk running the phones
